sub_title: Capacity building, research and PMEL on gender, sexuality and violence
summary: I have a master’s degree in sociology and a master’s degree in cultural studies, and seventeen years of experience in social research, social projects and education, in the fields of gender and sexuality, sexual and reproductive health and rights, violence, and urban cultural studies. I have worked with grass-root, national and international organizations and academic institutions in The Netherlands, East Africa, West Africa and Central America. I have highly developed skills in quantitative and qualitative research methods, planning, monitoring, evaluation and management of social projects, and formal and non-formal education. I am fluent in English, French and Spanish, both oral and written. I have authored and edited several published works, including the Anthology of contemporary Nicaraguan critical thinking (CLACSO, 2016), a chapter in the collective volume Bodies in resistance: gender and sexual politics in the age of neoliberalism (Palgrave Macmillan, 2017) and several articles and research reports.

authors.headline: Capacity building, research and PMEL on gender, sexuality and violence

profile_positions.description:
* Research and evaluation on gender and SRHR.
* Technical advise on PMEL for programmes and projects.
* Design and facilitation of training sessions on gender, SRHR and PMEL.
* Coordination of professionalisation programme for gender trainers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Gender Advisor

profile_positions.description:
* M&E for programmes on WASH, gender, social inclusion and SRHR in East Africa and South Asia,
including outcome and output data management, analysis and dashboarding, and
coordination of evaluation studies.
* Technical advise for research projects on WASH, gender and social exclusion.
* Collaboration in proposal development on WASH and women’s empowerment.
profile_positions.title: Senior Monitoring Evaluation and Learning Advisor

profile_positions.description:
* Coordinate an 18 month research project on unintended pregnancies and unsafe abortion in Benin and Kenya, in collaboration with the African Population and Health Research Centre.
* Create and maintain a monitoring system for a multi-country programme involving fifteen partner organizations.
* Manage relationships and communication with partners, oversee implementation of their workplans and provide training and technical advice.
* Review and approve narrative and financial reports from partners, in coordination with financial officer.
* Collaborate in writing reports for donors (including private donors).
* Collaborate in the writing of a successful grant application with a consortium of national and international organizations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Advisor

profile_positions.description:
* Design and implementation of research projects
* Writing and publication of academic texts
* Design, implementation and evaluation of undergraduate and graduate courses in social sciences (introduction to gender studies, research methodology, social theory).
* Collaboration in the organization of academic events.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: Design, implementation and evaluation of undergraduate and graduate courses in social sciences (introduction to gender studies, research methodology, social theory).
profile_positions.title: University Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
* Coordination of the digitization of early twentieth-century Nicaraguan newspapers.
* Listing and classification of the digitized newspapers.
* Writing of project reports.
profile_positions.title: Project coordinator

profile_positions.location: Nicaragua; Guatemala; Costa Rica; The Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
◦ Design and execution of research, evaluation and capacity-building projects, on gender, sexuality, violence and sexual and reproductive health and rights issues.
◦ Writing of reports, some of which were published.
◦ Coordination of teams of up to twelve people.
◦ Close coordination with grass-roots organizations.
◦ Work experience with national and international organizations, such as UNFPA, Save the Children, PAHO-WHO, ILO, Hivos, PATH, KNCV TB Fund, INTERVIDA, Fundación Puntos de Encuentro, Fondo Centroamericano de Mujeres, Fundación ANESVAD, IEEPP, INTERVIDA, Red NicaSalud, Movimiento Comunal.
profile_positions.title: Independent consultant

profile_positions.description:
◦ Technical support and monitoring of social projects implemented by grass-root organizations, on gender equity and sexual and reproductive health and rights issues.
◦ Design, organization and implementation of capacity-building strategies with partner organizations.
◦ Writing of project reports.
◦ Collaboration in the strategic and operational planning of the organization.
profile_positions.title: Project Advisor
